titleStmt.title: Strange and true newes of an ocean of flies dropping out of a cloud, upon the towne of Bodnam in Cornwall. To the tune of Cheevy Chase. When kings have lost their reignes and power, then clouds upon us judgements showre.
titleStmt.author: T. W.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the yeare of miracles. 1647.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Some talke of battailes in the aire,"...
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
